Sentencas: Dimethyl ether (DME) and water-ethanol mixtures are promising and attractive sources of hydrogen for fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Copper-cerium oxide systems have been studied as the catalysts for DME steam reforming (SR) to hydrogen-rich gas mixtures.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Hydrogen and carbon dioxide were the main reaction products; CO content was insignificant.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: For CO removal to 10ppm, the level tolerated by low-temperature fuel cells in the hydrogen-rich feed gas-the reaction of preferential CO methanation in the presence of CO2 has been used.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Nickel-cerium oxide system was used as the catalyst.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: SR of water-ethanol mixtures was performed using supported Rh catalyst.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Reaction products of ethanol SR at 400 degrees C contained H-2, CH4 and CO2.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: As the temperature increased to 600-700 degrees C, the CH4 concentration decreased considerably.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The obtained hydrogen-rich gas mixture can be used as a feed for high-temperature solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from dimethyl ether and bioethanol for fuel cell applications
